replies.bodyText: It corresponds to the mid - 1 in line 89. When left + 1 == right, then mid = right. Despite the result of startIndices.get(mid) < index, the for loop will be broken given finally left == right. If we don't have the +1, then it will becomes a dead loop if startIndices.get(mid) < index == true.
replies.author: mingen-pan

replies.bodyText: Can you have (right - left + 1) and right = mid instead then?
replies.author: kikkyo

timeline.bodyText: if there is only one element, left = right = 0, seems you will return 1?
timeline.author: kikkyo

replies.bodyText: Yes, you are right, because the returned line number should be 1-based index. Thus, +1 is added to the line number.
